BodyName: Subcommittee on Planning, Dispositions and Concessions

Items.Title: Application No. C 160097 PPQ submitted by the Department of Small Business Services, pursuant to Section 197-c of the New York City Charter, for the disposition of a lease to Flight Center Hotel, LLC, located at Building 60 at JFK International Airport, Block 14260, p/o Lot 1, pursuant to zoning, Borough of Queens, Community Districts 10, 12 and 13, Council District 28. This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to Charter Section 197-d(b)(2) or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to Charter Section 197-d(b)(3).
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Planning, TWA FLIGHT CENTER HOTEL AT JFK AIRPORT, Queens (C160097 PPQ)

Items.Title: Application No. 20165422 HAX submitted by New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development pursuant to Section 114, 122(l), 123, and 125 of the Private Housing Finance Law for approval of a new tax exemption, project summary, voluntary dissolution of the current owner, and conveyance from the current owner to a new owner of properties located at Block 2603, Lots 67, 73, 78, Borough of the Bronx, Community Board 2, Council District 8.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Planning, TIMPSON PLACE ASSOC., Bronx (20165422 HAX)

Items.Title: Application No. 20165481 HAX submitted by New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development pursuant to Section 577 of the Private Housing Finance Law and for an amendment to a previously approved real property tax exemption for property located at Block 2621, Lot 1 and Block 2632, Lot 1, Borough of the Bronx, Community Board 3, Council District 16.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Planning, ALBERT GOODMAN PLAZA, Bronx (20165481 HAX)

Items.Title: Application No. C 160097 PPQ submitted by the Department of Small Business Services, pursuant to Section 197-c of the New York City Charter, for the disposition of a lease to Flight Center Hotel, LLC, located at Building 60 at JFK International Airport, Block 14260, p/o Lot 1, pursuant to zoning, Borough of Queens, Community Districts 10, 12 and 13, Council District 28. This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to Charter Section 197-d(b)(2) or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to Charter Section 197-d(b)(3).
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Land Use Application be Approved by Subcommittee approved by Roll Call.
